summary: In 18th-century France, the Chevalier de Fronsac and his Native American friend Mani are sent to the Gevaudan province at the king's behest to investigate the killings of hundreds by a mysterious beast.
cast: Samuel Le Bihan|Mark Dacascos|Jérémie Renier|Vincent Cassel|Émilie Dequenne|Jacques Perrin|Christian Marc|Karin Kriström|Philippe Nahon|Virginie Darmon|Vincent Cespedes|Hans Meyer|Jean-Paul Farré|Pierre Lavit|Eric Prat|Bernard Farcy|Edith Scob|Michel Puterflam|Jean Yanne|Jean-Loup Wolff|Jean-François Stévenin|Nicolas Vaude|Max Delor|Christian Adam|Jean-Pierre Jackson|Nicky Naudé|Daniel Herroin|Gaëlle Cohen|Virginie Arnaud|Charles Maquignon|Frankie Pain|Isabelle Le Nouvel|Albane Fioretti|Monica Bellucci|Clarice Plasteig dit Caffou|Delphine Hivernet|Juliette Lamboley|Gaspard Ulliel|Pierre Castagne|Stéphane Pioffet|Eric Laffitte|Johan Leysen|Eric Delcourt|André Penvern|Bernard Fresson|Christelle Droy|Andres Fuentes|Nadine Marcovici|Jean-Claude Braquet|David Bogino|Emanuel Booz|François Hadji-Lazaro|Pascal Laugier|Olivier Colat-Parros
title: El pacto de los lobos
